briefTitle: Montelukast and Inhaled Nasal Steroid Tx in Adult Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)
officialTitle: Montelukast and Nasa ICS for Treatment of Mild Obstructive Sleep Apnea in Adults
summary: In children with mild apnea combined therapy with an inhaled nasal steroid and a medication that decreased nasal congestion (montelukast) was shown to be effective. We are testing to see if this combination works in adults with mild apnea as well.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Decrease in the Number of Apnea and/or Hypopnea Events to <5 Per Hour of Sleep
